jobTitle: Demand and Supply Planner  - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you a data-driven supply chain professional with a passion for optimization?

We're seeking a talented Demand and Supply Planner to join our team. In this role, you'll play a crucial part in balancing supply and demand, ensuring customer satisfaction while maximizing efficiency.

What You'll Do

Develop and execute demand and supply plans to optimize inventory levels and meet customer needs.

Collaborate with sales, marketing, and operations teams to forecast demand accurately.

Analyze supply chain data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities.

Manage and prioritize sales orders to ensure timely delivery.

Optimize inventory levels to balance cost, service, and risk.

Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance supply chain performance.

What You'll Bring

5+ years of experience in demand planning, supply planning, or inventory management.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and ERP systems (NetSuite preferred).

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

What We Offer

Competitive salary and benefits package.

Opportunities for professional growth and development.

A chance to work on challenging and rewarding projects.

If you're a motivated and results-oriented supply chain professional, we encourage you to apply!

Employment Type: Full-Time
